attributes.action: Urge the BBC to bring back the best comedy on BBC1 for years, Not Going Out
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBC have decided on 31 March 2009 to axe Not Going Out, despite it being popular and one of the best comedies on TV for a long while. This petition is for people who have enjoyed the past 3 series, to vote to have a new series commissioned.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
